Description: Up today we have a killer Epiphone Special Bass. Features dual humbuckers, a see thru Maple flame top, and a set neck. These basses are rare and hard to find. They look amazing and play and sound even better! Don't let this one slip passed you! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Special Black Maple Flame Top Set neck 4 String Electric Bass
ConditionDescription: In great used condition. Has some light swirl marks on the back and some light pick/play wear near the pickups. There's also some minor scuff marks on the bridge. Guitar has been stamped "Used" on the back of the headstock by Epiphone from the factory due to a finish flaw where the neck meets the body. The thin strip was left unstained and clear coated over at the factory. See pics for more info. Isn't noticeable until you go looking for it. Other than that, the bass is in great condition. Still has the factory plastic on the control plate and back of the tuners. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight. Frets are in excellent condition. Great player!!
